title: Second Conditional — if + Past, would + V

items.q: If I ___ (be) you, I ___ (take) the job.
We ___ (travel) more if we ___ (have) more money.
If he ___ (not be) so busy, he ___ (help) us.
If she ___ (know) the answer, she ___ (tell) you.
If I ___ you, I'd apologize.
If she ___ (know) his number, she ___ (call) him.
I ___ (help) you if I ___ (can).
If they ___ (have) more time, they ___ (travel) more.
I don't have a car, so I don't drive to work.
answer: if i had a car, i would drive to work.

items.q: She isn't free; she can't join us.
answer: if she were free, she would join us.

items.answer: if i were you i would study more
